message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value it offers.
Hi Alice, I understand the product's value, but I have a budget in mind. Could we meet halfway at $10,000?
